import React from "react"; const Filters = ({ setFilter, setSearchQuery }) => { const handleFilter = (filter) => { setFilter(filter); }; const handleSearch = (searchInput) => { setSearchQuery(searchInput); }; return (
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="border border-gray-500 rounded-lg w-[75%] lg:w-[50%] xl:w-[30%]" placeholder="Search for something" />
{/* filter buttons */}
{/*
*/}
); }; export default Filters;
